title: Chapter 6
content: . . .now in his old age he viewed tranquillity, domain such as the ancients would have coveted but not comprehended, ships from the Crimea to Madrid, and all the Empire, all with the same coin, speech, flag. The great old Union Jack dipping from sunrise to sunset: it had been fulfilled at last, that about the sun and the flag. EDFRANK CUSTOM JEWELERS

book.title: 高塔中的男人 The Man in the High Castle
book.description: 简介： Philip K. Dick 是当代北美最著名的畅销书作家之一，影响了村上春树、斯皮尔伯格等大家，被誉为美国的金庸，但他生前却屡遭退稿，穷困潦倒。 他预言了基因技术、克隆技术、记忆移植...
